name: Workin To Frighten
description:
Workin To Frighten

In this dungeon crawler,  you play as a monster named Gobli,  you have just started a new job where your goal is to scare children and collect their fear essence. This isn't an easy task, because you’re a goofy-looking monster you will need to search through empty bedrooms to find items to help you frighten the kids. These children are also well-defended their beloved toys have come to life to fight you off. Do you have what it takes to complete a week (5 days) of your new job? Play to find out.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Karate Chop: SpaceBar

Aim Hand: Mouse

Loot Objects: E key

My Other Games: https://jackbeterson.itch.io 

My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT0RKF5vurxLNJUNij7aRFA

Music: "8 Bit Hideout" By HeatleyBros 

   • "8 Bit Hideout!" ...
